title: X Factor: Celebrity's Ricki Lake to sing in tribute to late husband
text:
Get the tissues ready! (Picture: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX (10448479h)

Ricki Lake will be taking to the stage on X Factor: Celebrity this weekend – and will be singing a song as a tribute to her late husband Christian Evans.

The news was revealed on Lorraine this morning as they discussed all the X Factor gossip for this Saturday night’s show.

And while they didn’t unveil what song she would be singing, Dan Wooton told Lorraine that the song will be a tribute to her late husband.

Christian, a jewellery designer passed away back in 2017, after a long battle with bipolar disorder.

However, that hasn’t stopped Ricki from finding love again, as she believes Christian has given her his blessing to move on.

When chatting on Loose Women ahead of her X Factor stint, the 51-year-old opened up about her new boyfriend Jeffrey Scult.

She said: ‘I know he is proud of me, I know he is with me, I know he helped me meet this new love in my life.

‘I believe they’re very similar, I do have a type but I do believe he wants me to find love again – he doesn’t want me alone and I like to believe he has a hand in helping me find him.’

The American TV presenter continued: ‘I don’t think I’ll ever get over him, we had plans we had bought a home together, we had a future together.

‘When he died, the future I thought I had died that day. But I want people to know there is life after loss.’

X Factor: Celebrity returns this Saturday at 8.35pm on ITV.
